thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: giorgio magnanelli
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 giorgio magnanelli

author: giorgio magnanelli
title: giorgio magnanelli
text:
Banggood is really a very good Company. Every product I have bought has arrived after a short period. All the products are at a lower price respect to other on-line shops
In this case I received a Battery that was not working properly and they refund me with the whole amount of the product.
I trust in them with no reserve.
